Curio

You will soon be able to buy Curio. For now, please contact jonathan.grizou@glasgow.ac.uk if interested.

Zumo + Pixl

A decent alternative is to combine a Zumo robot ($109) and a Pixl Espruino board (Â£36).

Some of our demos use this combination which is quite powerful though more expensive, requires battery, and makes it hard to attach the phone to the robot.
